title: If I pass the online auditions of JYP and I am asked to come to Korea will JYP pay for my tickets? - Quora

response.answer_text: Tbh, I doubt. A lot of idols (idk if this is specific to JYP) have talked about how their agency won’t pay for stuff. I don’t remember the group, but a girl group who went on a singing competition show wanted to do a popular song but their agency wouldn’t pay for any royalties so I believe they ended up writing their own. Unless they are super super impressed with you (most of the talented idols didn’t even get this) and are like we can’t let this one get away, I think you’ll have to pay your way there as well as pay back debts later on for training and everything. Idk if you’ve done this yet, but research the process. If you make it through trainee days, you might become big and make bank. If you don’t make it through training or don’t make bank, you’ll be left with a lot of debt you’ll have to pay off.
